game.name: Train Kingdom
game.shortDescription: This is a railway history simulation game.Set in the United States of the 19th century. Get a railroad network that connects cities in the pioneering America. Use locomotives to carry supplies, passengers, and get money through trade. Complete various quests and gain fame.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a railway history simulation game.Set in the United States of the 19th century. Get a railroad network that connects cities in the pioneering America. Use locomotives to carry supplies, passengers, and get money through trade. Complete various quests and gain fame.
